definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend

sentences.english: But the enemy surrendered before Luigi could find Alberto.
sentences.chinese: 但是在路易基能找到阿爾貝託之前，敵人投降了。

sentences.english: We have given the hand to the Egyptians, and to the Assyrians, to be satisfied with bread.
sentences.chinese: 我們投降埃及人和亞述人，爲要得糧喫飽。

sentences.english: To surrender means to give up half your wager and not complete the hand.
sentences.chinese: 投降就是放棄您一半的賭注同時放棄這局牌。

sentences.english: In April 1975, South Vietnam surrendered to the North and Vietnam was reunited.
sentences.chinese: 1975年4月，南越向北越投降，越南統一。

sentences.english: At last, the emperor of Japan announced capitulation.
sentences.chinese: 終於，日本天皇宣佈投降。

sentences.english: Within a short while the 13th Army Group was completely wiped out, with all its troops surrendered.
sentences.chinese: 第十三兵團隨即全軍覆沒，所屬部隊全部投降。

sentences.english: To face the reality, we often do nothing, the flag to surrender.
sentences.chinese: 面對現實，我們常常束手無策，舉旗投降。

sentences.english: Hence the terrified wrinkle of those brows; hence all those great souls surrendering their swords.
sentences.chinese: 因此萬衆俯首戰慄，因此心靈偉大的人也全交劍投降。

sentences.english: Their leader had no alternative but to submit .
sentences.chinese: 他們的領導人除投降外，別無它法。

sentences.english: Before he surrendered, Mr. Saadat said he would die rather than give up.
sentences.chinese: 投降前，薩阿達特先生說，他寧死不降。

sentences.english: Completely surrounded by our soldiers , the enemy finally gave in.
sentences.chinese: 在我軍士兵得徹底包圍下，敵人終於棄械投降。

sentences.english: Shit , mate, you're lowering the flag.
Those stragglers and disbanded soldiers surrendered to the government.
sentences.chinese: 那些散兵遊勇向政府投降了。

sentences.english: Acceptance of penetration naturally requires submission.
sentences.chinese: 接受其插入確實需要投降的姿態。

sentences.english: Capitulations agreed upon between the contracting parties must take into account the rules of military honour.
sentences.chinese: 雙方所簽署之投降協定，需考慮軍人榮譽之規則。

definition: to surrender and pay allegiance to
to vow to fight to the death
to rely on help from sb
to realign one's allegiance (to another religion, ruler etc)/to submit
